holidays.title: Babe Ruth Day
holidays.description: Explore Babe Ruth’s extraordinary life through his childhood, baseball years, and cancer.

holidays.title: Bob Wills Day
holidays.description: Celebrating The King Of Western Swing, Bob Wills, right here with us at National Today.

holidays.title: Day of Uprising Against Occupation
holidays.description: Let’s mark the anniversary of the founding of the Slovenian Liberation Front.

holidays.title: Eeyore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Friends of the Forest never forget to make animals feel special on this day.

holidays.title: Free Feral Cat Spay Day
holidays.description: Honor cats of all kinds, no matter where they call home. Help them get spayed!

holidays.title: Freedom Day  (South Africa)
holidays.description: Freedom Day celebrates the struggles and victories of the people of South Africa to reach independence.

holidays.title: Independent Bookstore Day
holidays.description: Join us as we turn the page and learn why books matter so much.

holidays.title: International Donor Conception Awareness Day
holidays.description: Help educate others about the significance of donor conception in the lives of infertile couples.

holidays.title: International Marconi Day
holidays.description: Today, we acknowledge the inventor of wireless communication and seamless radio transmission.

holidays.title: International Sculpture Day
holidays.description: Get your hammer and chisel ready, it’s International Sculpture Day! Celebrate right here with us!

holidays.title: Koningsdag
holidays.description: Happy Koningsdag to all of the Dutch people, and happy birthday to King Willem-Alexander!

holidays.title: Lapu Lapu Day
holidays.description: Let us do a little victory dance in honor of Lapu-Lapu Day!

holidays.title: Marine Mammal Rescue Day
holidays.description: Today, we pay tribute to all marine life contributors. Let us send them our gratitude!

holidays.title: Matanzas Mule Day
holidays.description: Learn the story of a mule honored after losing its life during the American-Spanish War.

holidays.title: Morse Code Day
holidays.description: Learn about Morse code history, facts, and why this code is so important to the world.

holidays.title: National Alicia Day
holidays.description: Take the day to celebrate all the Alicias you know and love, famous or not.

holidays.title: National Day of Puppetry
holidays.description: Celebrate the fascinating theatrics of puppets on this day and make one for yourself!

holidays.title: National Devil Dog Day
holidays.description: Our celebrations for National Devil Dog Day this April 27 promise to be very sweet indeed!

holidays.title: National Go Birding Day
holidays.description: It’s time to break out the binoculars and observe the activities of our feathered friends.

holidays.title: National Kiss of Hope Day
holidays.description: Learn how to embody hope and work with your partner to support your household.

holidays.title: National Little Pampered Dog Day
holidays.description: Every dog has the right to be pampered and treated like royalty.

holidays.title: National Patricia Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Patricia Day by recognizing all the great Patricas you know.

holidays.title: National Pneumatics Day
holidays.description: Get eco-friendly production spaces using clean, dry compressed air in automation and processing equipment.

holidays.title: National Pool Opening Day
holidays.description: See how pool owners across the country take care of their pools in preparation for summer.

holidays.title: National Prime Rib Day
holidays.description: A feast day to honor the classic cut of the finest beef ever known to man.

holidays.title: National Rebuilding Day
holidays.description: Roll up your sleeves and grab your tools, it’s time to get building.

holidays.title: National Sense of Smell Day
holidays.description: Don’t turn your nose up at this day dedicated to preserving your sense of smell.

holidays.title: National Tell A Story Day
holidays.description: Bring color to your life and spread joy through the art of storytelling!

holidays.title: Order of National Artist
holidays.description: We've compiled some cool history tidbits, fun facts, and awesome ways to celebrate, just for you!

holidays.title: Save the Frogs Day
holidays.description: Today is dedicated to our hoppy, jumpy friends who are an important part of our environment.

holidays.title: Sierra Leone Independence Day
holidays.description: To all Sierra Leoneans, on your independence anniversary, we celebrate with you.

holidays.title: Teach Children To Save Day
holidays.description: It’s never too early to teach your children about the importance of saving money.

holidays.title: Togo Independence Day (Togo)
holidays.description: Today, come join us in celebrating the anniversary of Togo's Independence Day!

holidays.title: Woody Woodpecker Day
holidays.description: Let's take a journey down memory lane, shall we, all you crazy birds?

holidays.title: World Design Day
holidays.description: The world would be a dull place without good design. Let’s appreciate it today!

holidays.title: World Healing Day
holidays.description: We've got the best ways to spend this day with the most rejuvenating activities.

holidays.title: World Tai Chi and Qigong Day
holidays.description: Take part in a global event that promotes the importance of maintaining your well-being.

holidays.title: World Tapir Day
holidays.description: World Tapir Day strives to safeguard these endangered species for future generations.

holidays.title: World Veterinary Day
holidays.description: Today, we are celebrating veterinarians and the bonds between people and animals!

holidays.title: Lizzo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This incredible musician is going places and changing the world one song at a time.

holidays.title: Melinda Melrose’s Birthday
holidays.description: As a model, YouTuber, and actress, Melinda Melrose is an inspiring person to all.

holidays.title: Patrick Stump’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented musician is no stranger to stardom and he will never cease to amaze us.
